title: SNP 'working on blueprint' to avoid separate Scotland hard border with England - but details being kept secret
text:
The SNP's leadership has claimed to be working on a blueprint to prevent a separate Scotland having a hard border with England but refused to disclose any details of how it would work.

Ian Blackford, the SNP's Westminster leader, said the party had been working on a solution for "effective trading" if an independent Scotland was in the EU and the rest of the UK outside.

Pressed to share the blueprint, given the UK and EU have been unable to find one for the Irish land border, Mr Blackford said "today's not the day for coming out for that."
